text:
The current RDC site has menu items

    * Mailing Lists
    * Bugs
    * Building
    * CI

which still link to the Jakarta site.

However, there are also entries for all of these (except Building) under "Project Information" which point to local resources.

The outdated links should be removed.
creator: sebb@apache.org
bayard@apache.org
text:
I've judiciously regexped it:

 perl -pi -e 's/jakarta.apache.org\/taglibs/tomcat.apache.org\/taglibs/' * */*
 perl -pi -e 's/jakarta.apache.org\/tomcat/tomcat.apache.org/g' * */*
